name: logseq
description: Logseq is a privacy-first, open-source note-taking and knowledge management tool that uses a local-first approach. It supports visual graph views, Markdown, backlinks, and plugins with optional sync.
features: Knowledge Graph: Visual graph view, Bidirectional links, Connected thinking. See relationships between notes.
Local-First: Privacy-focused, Offline-first, File-based storage. Your data stays on your device.
Markdown Support: Plain text files, Portable format, Future-proof. Notes you can always access.
Plugin System: Extend functionality, Community plugins, Custom workflows. Make Logseq yours.
